intro: A modern warfare FPS game powered by a next-generation engine, featuring stunning, realistic graphics! Become a member of the world's most elite special forces!
description:
Experience the most tactical and innovative FPS, incorporating cutting-edge, near-future tactics into modern warfare systems.
<Battle Force> is an FPS game where players become a member of the world's most elite special forces and confront advanced threats threatening the world.

Players become elite agents of the team and are assigned to a mission to stop the activation of the "Omega System," the ultimate weapon that will ignite war. Prove your skills among the world's most elite agents!

・Top-notch, realistic graphics and presentation deliver an overwhelming sense of immersion.
・Battles unfold across vast fields, allowing players to freely move and engage based on their strategic choices.
・Mobile equipment is provided, allowing you to quickly move across the vast battlefield and secure tactical strongholds. Experience the cooperative action essential to team victory with unique equipment for each class: Assault, Engineer, Support, and Recon.
・Experience strategic action by securing strategic strongholds or breaking down enemy defenses in Deathmatch, Conquest, and Rush game modes.
・Control next-generation tanks to strike enemy strongholds or provide cover for friendly infantry.
・Fully engage in missions across intensely tense environments, from chaotic desert bases to massive secret factories dominated by iron and intense heat.

In <Battle Force>, optimal tactics are achieved through the combination of player skill and teamwork.Working as a team creates the perfect weapon.
Share your tactics and achieve victory.

Synopsis
The world faces a threat from a highly sophisticated private military and technological organization known as "ShadowNet". They instigate conflicts between existing nations, secretly sell cutting-edge weapons, and seek to destroy the world order.

Players become elite agents of a special forces unit, tasked with tracking down the leader of a shadow network wreaking havoc across the globe and preventing the activation of their ultimate weapon, the Omega System.

Join the special forces now and save the world!
Take on extreme missions with your most trusted allies!
